Plot: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 11 nominations.
Title: Primal Fear
Writer: William Diehl (novel), Steve Shagan (screenplay), Ann Biderman (screenplay)
Actors: Richard Gere, Laura Linney, John Mahoney, Alfre Woodard
